attributes.action: stimulate industry by funding the skylon spacecraft
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: developing Reaction Engines ltd skylon SSTO spacecraft would create thousands of highly skilled jobs, make the UK a world leader in spacecraft technology and due to the fact the skylon produces no carbon dioxide this would be a green project. All these factors are critical to the future health of UK industry.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
